description:
The purpose of this module is to allow students to integrate
multi-dimensional defence technology that include C3,
Sensors and Intelligence, Artificial Intelligence, Guided
Weapons, Unmanned Systems, Cyber, Operations
Research, Systems Engineering, etc, to study, formulate
and analyse an actual military problem with the goal of
recommending a design solution with the principles of
systems engineering and design that involve complex
systems.
title: Systems Design Project
